topic.title: PHARMACOTHERAPY STOP SMOKING AID RECEIVED
topic.shortdesc: If a PERSON is 'lost to follow-up' at 4 weeks (where it has not been possible successfully to follow-up during the period four to six weeks from the Intended Smoking Quit Date, see OUTCOME AT 4 WEEK FOLLOW-UP FOR STOP SMOKING) and it is not known what aids (if any) they received, they should be recorded as default code 'Treatment option not known'.
